doc.field: Series IV. Advertising Promotion Department Records
Subseries IV.A. Special Events and Publicity Director Keith Morris Files

Time Inc. Sports Illustrated Publishing and Business Records
Time Inc. Sports Illustrated Publishing and Business Records
Subsubseries IV.A.4. Recordings of Sports Figures Interviews [RESTRICTED]
Subsubseries IV.A.4. Recordings of Sports Figures Interviews [RESTRICTED]

This series contains recordings of several hundred interviews conducted by Keith Morris of sports figures, possibly as part of the Sports Illustrated tape service, to be sent out to media stations. Some interviews are of athletes named Sportsman or Sportswoman of the Year, winners of top honors in their sport, and Olympic competitors. Besides current and former athletes, subjects include coaches, managers, and sportscasters. The majority of interviews date from 1980 to 1986. Each tape could contain up to five different interviews.
Unreformatted audiovisual material in the collection is not accessible.
